basics.name: Javier Maroto Morales
basics.summary: I obtained my PhD at EPFL to specialize in responsible AI, that is safer and more reliable. I have 2+ years of experience in analytical consulting with several top Spanish clients. I am currently pursuing Data Scientist and Machine Learning roles to apply my skills and make an impact in the industry.

work.name: École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL)
work.description:
Worked for armasuisse Science & Technology in a 4-years collaboration with their team of engineers
Designed and implemented frameworks in Pytorch and JAX for improving the robustness of neural networks against adversarial perturbations by leveraging inherent data properties, outperforming state-of-the-art robust neural networks.
Published 3 papers in leading machine learning conferences
Used adversarial training, knowledge distillation, and data generation with diffusion models.
Applied these frameworks to computer vision and wireless communications
Attended ML optimization courses and lead projects on applications like NLP or federated learning

work.name: École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL)
work.description:
Designed a novel data-rich autoencoder framework in Python to improve state-of-the-art results in recommender systems.
Published a paper in ICASSP
